item.title: LISTEN! YOU NEED TO BE STRONG. YOU NEED TO BE PREPARED. - Nov 27,2011
item.description:
Trevor Davis and Mike Bradford of Revival Fire Radio declare a strong exhortation to be ready, prepared and strong in the LORD for these days. Persecution, affliction and tribulation as outlined by Jesus and the prophets and apostles in scripture are coming upon us now. Jesus said that many would fall away and give up due to affliction and persecution. Yet this is verily what is coming. You shall be hated by the nations of the world as they embrace their replacement for Jesus Christ. This is the time to be ready as a fully disciplined person who has their flesh crucified and under subjection. This is the time to abide in the Lord in complete submission, love and fear of the LORD. This is the time to be ready for the trying by fire that is coming forth by the LORD. The LORD will have a purified people tried by fire. Yet, many will love this present evil age and darkness rather than the light. We urge all to take this very very seriously and run to the LORD, with a focus upon the Lord, laying down every weight and sin and run this race with endurance. Take Peter the apostles counsel to grow in the various aspects of Christ that you may experience the promise of never falling away, neither being barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus. 2Peter 1:3-11

Jesus the Son of GOD | God the Father our creature | Holy Ghost an FIRE | Discipleship into the Kingdom of GOD | REPENT of all of your SINS

item.title: Doctrine of Life versus Doctrines of devils. - Nov 14,2011
item.description:
This evenings broadcast discusses the grieving of the Spirit of God over the massive apostasy in our day as prophesied by Jesus, the apostles and prophets. This prophetic word is recorded in the scriptures. It is so vital to have a true heart that seeks the Lord and studies the scriptures so one can be truly prepared for the great deceptions in the last days. Groves of the religious people are following men that are not following Jesus as the Head of the church. We all have to decide whether we will be of the true church that Jesus is building or will we be part of the Church of the Tares that the devil is building? Many use the bible as a prop but lack the life and love of God. Too many religious leaders have succumbed to the temptation of Satan. Many are mocking the importance of doctrine and elevate the words of men instead. We are not speaking of head knowledge bible bashing, but we are speaking of the doctrine of life that is inspired by God recorded as the Word of God. There is no lie within Gods Word. This is our gift to cherish in a day of lies, deception and error. Love the Word of God. Eat it, consume it, and reflect it. We must be born not of corruptible seed but be born again by the Word of God (1Peter 1:23). "Beware of men", said Jesus. Beware of the leaven of the tare teachers that have forsaken the Lord and His Word.

Jesus the Son of GOD | God the Father our creature | Holy Ghost an FIRE | Discipleship into the Kingdom of GOD | REPENT of all of your SINS

item.title: Stats, Status and the Headless Church Monster - Oct 22,2011
item.description:
Trevor Davis and Mike Bradford of Revival Fire Radio October 21, 2011 Todays headlines reflect the tragic reality of the current apostasy underway in the Church Land. The majority of the Church World is being proven to be statistically worldly contrary to the scriptures call to be separate and holy unto the Lord. God has provided the means and way for righteousness by faith. Too many have not desired the Lord above all things and have taken detours from the strait and narrow way that leads unto life. God is calling. He is beckoning to those who have ears to hear His voice to return unto Him and amend their ways. Darkness is expanding as another story illustrates today regarding the increase of people celebrating the Satanic holiday of Halloween. Even within the Church World, sadly, the call for separation unto the holy Lord God is disobeyed through all the compromise in Christianizing this wicked holiday of the world. God has called His people to lead the children and teach them to be obedient. But, through this compromise, the Lord is offended by the horrible example of the parents and teachers leading the children astray into occultism that is so prevalent as in Halloween. Trevor Davis www.soundingthealarm.comStats, Status and the Headless Church Monster

item.title: PHARISEE-ISM vs Preachers - Oct 21,2011
item.description:
Our guest this broadcast will be: Trevor Davis. I am you host Revival Fire stay tune for this urgent broadcast. I believe we should speak about the difference between religious Pharisee--ism and authentic Preachers who are called by God as Heralders or Proclaimers. PHARISEE-ISM vs Preachers (Grk=keryx) A scriptural clarification of the difference Mike Bradford and Trevor Davis Religious land misunderstands the preachers of God as they tell it like it is and uproot the wickedness in the land. They are falsely accused of being unloving because they speak the truth. The people that think this way are in misunderstanding of what love is. Today, people think "niceness" is love. But love is an attribute of God that brings forth faith. Faith works by love. Love is of God. God tells the truth. Therefore, the preachers of God tell the truth as is written. It is written, thus says the LORD, is the message of the preachers. Their word is Gods Word. Trevor Davis www.soundingthealarm.com

Augusto Perez was born in Cuba in 1951, and lived there for 12 years. He came to the U.S. in 1963 with his family where he has lived ever since. From childhood Augusto “felt” that God had an important work for him to do when he grew up. At the age of 30, one night as he was lying on his bed sleeping, he heard someone call out his name softly. His Web-Site is: http://www.theappearance.com/new-page-20.htm and His e-mail address is: theappearance@windstream.net Write him a E-mail asking him questions or Prayer request he would be glad to hear from you all out there.
